property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever an enemy Corporeal creature is destroyed, place a Skull token on Altar. Once per round, as a full action, a friendly cleric creature in Altar's zone may place a Skull token on Altar. While Altar has 8 or more Skull tokens, it gains Lifebond +2, all Living creatures gain Finite Life, and during the Upkeep Phase each Living creatures receives 2 direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Orchid's attack targets a Mage, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token, choose an equipment object on that Mage, and pay its casting cost to destroy that object. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Unique, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living

property.name: Text
property.value: All other Living creatures and conjurations gain Innate Life +2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Lightning Immunity, Burnproof, Epic, Necromancer Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Graveyard may summon one Dark Nonliving creature. The first time each round that a creature is destroyed, you may place mana equal to its Level on Graveyard.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Legendary, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in Mohktari's zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Lotus's attack targets a Living non-Mage creature, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token and pay mana equal to that creature's Level +2 to place a Sleep condition marker on that creature. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Druid Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, if there is 3 or more mana on Seedling Pod, it may cast 1 plant creature or conjuration which targets its zone, an object on its zone, or a border of its zone. It it does, destroy Seedling Pod.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living, Druid Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Seedling Pod spells gain the Cantrip trait. During the Deployment Phase, Samara Tree may cast 1 Seedling Pod spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained and gains the Unmovable trait. Each Upkeep Phase, before paying Stranglevine's upkeep cost, place 1 Crush token on Stranglevine. X = the number of Crush tokens on Stranglevine. When you pay Stranglevine's Upkeep cost, this creature receives X direct damage. Stranglevine gains Life +2X. Stranglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Stranglevine. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained and gains the Unmovable trait. Tanglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Tanglevine. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Living, Druid Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, you may pay 1 mana to place 1 additional Vine marker with your Spreading Vines ability. During the Deployment Phase, Vine Tree may cast 1 vine creature or conjuration spell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Dark Mage Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: When a friendly zombie creature destroys a Living non-Epic creature with a melee attack, you may pay half that creature's cast cost (rounded up) to Reanimate it. When the creature comes into play, place a Zombie condition marker on it, and place damage on it equal to its Level.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Passage Attacks, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: Ichthellid comes into play with an egg token on it. When Ichthellid's attack damages, but does not destroy, a Living creature, you may pay 1 mana and remove the egg token to an Ichthellid Larva marker on that creature.

property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, each friendly skeleton object, in or bordering Mort's zone, may Reconstruct up to 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may reveal Stumble. If you do, the creature can't take a move action until the end of its Action Phase. Then, destroy Stumble. Has no effect on creatures with the Unmovable or Uncontainable trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Obscured and Light -2 traits. [Obscured] [Light -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Up to twice per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he, or a spawnpoint he controls, casts or reveals a necro or undead spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Necro/Undead] [x2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick necro spell, you may pay 2 mana to target a zone up to 1 zone away. All friendly undead creatures in that zone gain Melee +1 until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a plant spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Plant] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Libro Mortuos may summon one undead creature into your zone. If Libro Mortuos is destroyed, you may lose 3 Life to return it to your spellbook instead of the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this Mage is attacked, at the end of the Roll Dice Step, he may convert up to 2 critical damage to normal damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a quick spell, you may pay 1 mana to place a Vine Marker in a target zone up to 1 zone away. Once per round, as a quick spell, you may pay 4 mana and destroy a target friendly Vine marker up to 2 zones away, to give a target non-flying creature in that zone the Stuck condition.

property.value: Target friendly vine marker makes the above attack. Then, destroy that vine marker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roll 6 attack dice. Target skeleton object may Reconstruct up to that much damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove all Burn condition markers from all objects. All friendly Living objects may heal up to 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each friendly skeleton object in the arena rolls 6 attack dice and may Reconstruct up to that much damage (roll separately for each object).

property.name: Text
property.value: Until the end of the round, all zombie creatures in the arena lose the Lumbering, Slow, and Pest traits, and gain the Fast and Bloodthirsty +1 traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target revealed enchantment. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost)
